name: scoreboard
description: Westmont Math Field Day Scoreboard v2

scripts.build: bun run --filter @scoreboard/shared build && bun run --filter @scoreboard/core build && bun run --filter @scoreboard/control build && bun run --filter @scoreboard/projection build && bun run --filter @scoreboard/main build
scripts.typecheck: bun run --filter @scoreboard/shared typecheck && bun run --filter @scoreboard/core typecheck && bun run --filter @scoreboard/control typecheck && bun run --filter @scoreboard/projection typecheck && bun run --filter @scoreboard/main typecheck
scripts.ci: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run test && bun run build
scripts.package:mac:unsigned: bun run build && bunx electron-builder --mac zip --publish never
